website_summaries.verdict: An excellent kit for removing stubborn blackheads and other types of blemishes. Offers enough probes and suction settings to tackle numerous skin concerns.
pros: Removes blackheads, pimples, whiteheads, and other blemishes with suction
You can choose your level of suction (there are five) based on your needs
cons: May leave bruises, so it's best for novices to start with the lowest setting

customer_reviews.title: Having acne/oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been very skeptical about buying this product, but I’m so happy I did! I’ve always struggled with acne and bad pores and I didn’t really know how to handle it. I was scrolling for skin products on Amazon and came across this one. Once it delivered I used it right away. I cleaned my face of course to open my pores and I am amazed/disgusted on how much crud was on my skin. This product does wonders. I will no longer pop my pimples because this does the trick! Delicate and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for several days. I mostly get blackheads and clogged pores around my nose and this has finally cleared it up for me! It absorbs blackheads and oil. After using, large pores have become small and each pore is clean! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean but really good at cleaning skin
customer_reviews.text: Omg I have found the solution to my yucky black and white heads! I recently started to get yucky bumps of black and white heads on my nose, under my nose and on my chin!! Gross! Those nose peel things didn’t work well and then I found this little machine!! Life saver but I have to do it like 3-4 times a week! But it helps me to feel a little more confident and clean after each use! Although cleaning the little suction head is a pain and the tiny little pad/filter! Otherwise it’s a great product!
customer_reviews.author: melinda french

customer_reviews.title: It surprisingly works!
customer_reviews.text: This product surprised me. I thought it was one of those gimmicks but it actually does work. Follow the instructions for sure on where you start on your face and which direction you go or otherwise it will leave you with red marks on your face. The instruction were not clear on how to clean/change the foam part. In fact, I didn't see any instructions on it. It looks like maybe you have to cut it to size to replace it but I havent attempted it yet.
customer_reviews.author: scremer1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! This thing really, really works. If you're like me, beauty products like these at such a cheap price seem to good to be true. But this product lived up to every expectation! Using it twice a week! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Wright

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying little device
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised! This is the type of product I wouldn't have thought would really work, but my sister bought one and swore by it, so here I am. I've only used it twice so far, and I like it. My sister has used hers for a few months now and says it has allowed her pores to shrink, so I'm hoping with time to notice the same.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Conley

customer_reviews.title: A must have for large pores!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I have used this on me and my husband and works great for both and we both have very different skin types the suction it provides is impressive and you can see the amount of gunk that it removes also the different heads that are provided and great
customer_reviews.author: megan williams

customer_reviews.title: Use steamer to open pores first, if you have smaller pores
customer_reviews.text: I saw a similar product (could have been same one) on As Seen On TV and decided to buy it through Amazon. I was eager to use it and tried it right as I got it. This stuff has a powerful suction. I have smaller pores, so it didnt get a lot out for me, however I had a friend try it (after I cleaned it - which was easy) and she was able to get a lot out of her pores. I think next time I will use with a steamer to open up my pores. Either way, I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Korie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I honestly feel like this would work for certain skin types. The suction is great, it’s easy to use, but I ordered this to try and remove very small white heads on my nose and it didn’t work at all. I tried even the highest setting and had to give up after looking a little swollen lol hopefully I can return. But just because it doesn’t work for one thing doesn’t mean it won’t for another. & a cool feature it had was a tip to smooth fine lines which I wasn’t expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Don't use tretinoin and use steam!
customer_reviews.text: I only used it for a week and the first day I bruised my face the suction is so strong. And I didn't know to stop using tretinoin creams for 48 hrs before use. So the second time I tried it after bruising was gone... My pores closed up and I feel so clean and my face looks so fresh I'm so super surprised and loving how my face looks. Try the first two settings first. Make sure u open ur pores with steam before use and it works wonders. Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Not as affective as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This product had good suction but didnt work as advertised. I purchased it to help my pre teen son get rid of some unwanted black heads. It only removed 1. We tried steaming his face ahead of time to open the doors and it still didnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Cl

customer_reviews.title: Works best with steam.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely gets stuff out that I can’t with regular washing. Hence the photo. It will take practice to master. It doesn’t slide super easy, especially on areas of the face where the skin isn’t as tight. But since I was young, I’ve tried to clean my huge pores and squeezed, and used masks, and never seemed to get much benefit. I just got this and first pass obviously got some good stuff. Will take time to see if my pores get smaller. Also, I did a pass without steaming first. And got some. But took a bath and did it again after, and got a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer_1428

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: The suction is powerful. So powerful that my nose looks like Rudolph the Red Nose Reindeer. The suction is adjustable; however, it does not appear to clean the pores unless on the highest setting. After use the suction cup clearly had evidence of working; however, my pores look like cavernous pox marks. My skin is sensitive, so this may not be the device for me.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmutter

customer_reviews.title: Never worked and little directions
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product never worked from the day I got it. i was excited to try and charged it right away. The product never started. Don't rely on the directions to figure things out.
customer_reviews.author: E.L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: My Son got this from us for his birthday and he used it right away. He said ti is the better of all the products he uses. The suction was good and he can see the junk from his face being removed in the tube. The item did not leave little rings on his face from the sucking power. He really enjoys this item and he has used a few different items. This wsa a home run present.
customer_reviews.author: R. Young

customer_reviews.title: Disposable suction remover works a few times then stops working for no apparent reason
customer_reviews.text: It works great. Does remove gunk from my nose and face. The downside is mine just stopped sucking after 2 months. It shows it has charge but no suction occurs any more. It’s so disappointing because it was helpful but not after it just stopped working. I wish I could return it but there is not much help about if you are faced with this problem. I usually buy products like this and take care of them and expect they work for at least a year not just a couple uses or months. So if you just need something disposable you may consider this item but if you want something longer lasting I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Does not pull out blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many times with this. The suction seems pretty good, but it by far does not put out any blackheads. It at first was pulling dry skin and the oil on my face but not anymore. I even tried it on a blackhead that was good an ready and it couldn't. Waste of my money 🙄🙄 Edit: Still is horrible but they try to hide reviews as well.
customer_reviews.author: MadisonSweets

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It's like a really strong vacuum on your skin. The suction power is strong, it just din't pull anything out of my skin. It did leave a red circle on my skin, though
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel20

customer_reviews.title: quarantine beauty essential
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I was still using old school ways to get rid of my pores up until I’ve discovered this product. I’ve started noticing my large pores due to being quarantined and obsessively staring at my face in front of my bathroom mirror..prior to discovering this tool, I felt that my pores were very obvious and I was never really able to fully clean each one. I’m so glad I’ve hopped on the new and advanced beauty tool to help me clean out my blackheads, and it’s strangely addicting to use...highly recommend if you want minimized pores and smoother skin in just one application a week!
customer_reviews.author: Mundy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool & Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I originally had gotten the package with no box and no instructions. Just inside a plastic bag. I contacted the seller and within the same day they got back to me (letting me know that amazon damaged the box and prepackaged it!) correcting the issue and letting me know they were mailing out a replacement for free! I am amazed at the customer service alone. Thanks much! —— I love the suction power of this tool, it really helps with the blackheads you can reach surface wise after steaming for ten minutes. My nose appreciates it!
customer_reviews.author: Casey T

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy just bruises your skin
customer_reviews.text: Looks like someone drew on my face .... I have red lines that look like hickeys .... didn’t even remove any blackheads ... now I have class to go to and it looks like I just a kid colored on my face with a red/purple marker.... great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS SO WELL!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this product! It cleans EASILY. Its so super easy to use. It worked reallly well. I was able to very easily clean pores which gave my face a lighter, brighter and smoother look. The ONLY downside is that its too powerful if you aren't careful, you can give yourself a bruise so be sure to keep moving the devices heads across the skin. Don't try to use it to eliminate a whitehead by sitting it over the comedone. I do wish the seperate heads were labled.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing and it doesn’t work at all, terrible quality. Returned Edited 10/18/20: They are sending me e-mails offering money to delete my review
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Marques

customer_reviews.title: Left bruises all over my face
customer_reviews.text: Never written a 1 start review on amazon but I had to for this. I was very careful using this, started with the low suction setting, didn’t linger long on any areas. And despite that, it left bruises ALL over my face (and I don’t even have sensitive skin). I went to bed and woke up with huge dark purple spots all over my face. On top of that, despite steaming my face beforehand, it barely did anything to my blackheads. After a lot of aggressive and frequent icing, the bruises are now gone. Thankfully they didn’t leave marks, because I hyperpigment easily. Took 3-4 days though. I will never be using this again and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MQ

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I should have gotten this a long time ago. It worked good and you see all the pores being cleaned out when you use it. I’ve been using it everyday. It is really powerful, just use the bigger tip that prop idea more suction.
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Very help full tool. If you have a black heads plz go for it.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I order this product because I have a blackhead problem. I was looking for this product from very long time. I order this product and received yesterday. Super excited to give this product a try. And guess what, I love it. Before this I use blackhead remover tool silver one. But this one is much better than that. Perfect suction. It's really clean my white heads and black heads. My use that product on my husband's nose to because of extra heads I received with this product. He loves it. Easy to use and easy to clean. And the last thing I love about this one is it charge with charging table no more batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Tkhan

customer_reviews.title: Great for surface stuff but don't expect extrusion
customer_reviews.text: I have larger pores and combination skin, so I tend to get acne and whiteheads. Add in constant face mask wearing, and this tends to be bad around my jawline and mouth where the mask rubs. This vacuum is definitely worth the price! I use it for exfoliating and oil removal. Removing the dead skin and oils without more adding more cleaners to my routine has been really effective! What people say about steaming first is true through. While you can use this without taking a shower first, you'll need to be more aggressive with the tool to get the same results. The stronger the sucking power, the more likely you are to get hickies, so I keep it low.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Knight

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as well as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of small blackheads around my nose and chin, this didn't really work on them. I followed the instructions and tried all of the different tips but it never really worked. If I started small pimples by squeezing with my fingers it kind of worked. It did work for a clogged pore in my armpit. If you have sensitive skin or bruise easily put an ice pack on your face after using it. Also it doesn't come with a wall plug in for charging. I just used one from an old phone charger.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan S

customer_reviews.title: High suction vacuum for those blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I used to use those nose strips on my nose but they never seemed to grab everything. This does the trick. If you see on the picture that’s just one blackhead I had on my forehead. When I used it in my nose it’s pretty crazy all the stuff it takes out. I won’t gross you guys out with a picture of that lol. Suction is perfect. I keep it on level 4 at all times Comes with different suction cups for different applications Highly recommend this over those more expensive ones. Battery life is amazing and a single charge has still lasted me a couple weeks using every day for 10 minutes straight.
customer_reviews.author: kenny Roland pollich

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent product, didn't work as well as described
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this for cleaning out my pores, specifically on my nose area. While I do see some sebum being extracted, I definitely can visibly still see clogged pores. I've also noticed its making my skin much dryer in that area, even with heavy moisturizer intervention. I can see how this would work really well for others, but for my specific needs I don't love it as much as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: AVGremps

customer_reviews.title: Just bug a Big Bite Thing
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this for pimples just buy a Bug Bite Thing and save a lot of money. The suction is just as good. If you are buying it as a facial then it’s fine. I have been using mine for over a week and it makes my face red very briefly so maybe it is doing something. The best thing it does it remind me to put on super hydrating (in others words thick) lotion in the evening. I will not buy it again and as I said before just buy a Bug Bite Thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sally S

customer_reviews.title: Left bruises
customer_reviews.text: I used this product once on my nose and surrounding areas of my face. It did not bruise my nose at all but also did not remove as many black heads as id expect. My upper cheeks around my nose had long streaks of bruises for a few days after using. I have not tried it again. This was on the 2nd to lowest suction level as well and moving over the skin at a medium pace. Still left bruises. If you have sensitive skin at all don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I can’t believe I waiting so long to purchase one! This does exactly what it’s supposed to and has multiple attachments. The only thing I would recommend is to start with lower suction and see what your skin could handle. I don’t have sensitive skin so I can use it on the strongest suction with no problem. I also recommend to not keep it in one spot too long (as recommended in the instructions) because I’m sure this could leave marks (especially on those with move sensitive skin). Overall, this product has been one of my favorite purchases ever made, and it was extremely affordable.. worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Life changing product
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum, comes with 3 other vacuum heads for different uses (has instructions for how to use them) has 5 different suction speeds I typically do 2-3 on my face and 4-5 on my nose. I have used this product for a week now and I personally think it has helped will post photos used 3 times this week( Monday, Wednesday and Friday) will post pics taken Monday after suctioning vs today Saturday when I woke up. Battery lasts a few uses. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amani

customer_reviews.title: My own little spa at home
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty straight forward. It comes with the main handle with 4 different nozzles and a usb cord to charge. Press the middle button and it powers up. Press up or down to adjust the suction level. Even at level 3 I was like woah! I don’t quite know if I will make it up to 5. Either way, it definitely exfoliated and removed dirt and gunk! As for blackheads I’m not really sure I can tell. Cleaning the head, you just pop it off and clean it. It says don’t get any water on the main handle part so make sure it’s dry! Going to continue to use it! Feels like a mini microderm session or something!
customer_reviews.author: anniebioticz

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin and blackheads
customer_reviews.text: This little device is super powerful . I got it to use on my blackheads , and it actually worked better than I thought . My husband has super oily skin , and I decided to use it on him for fun . I did mainly his T-zone and the amount of oil this device extracted was pretty incredible (and gross). I had to wash the nozzle out about 4 times to get the oil out . Disgusting , but it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Wifey McMombie

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all sorts of things to help my teens with their acne. Nothing seemed to work as nicely as this blackhead vacuum. First, it doesn't require batteries and that is a HUGE plus. Many other machines require batteries and after a few uses, they don't seem to work as well. This charges rapidly and will hold a charge for mulitple uses. Second, the different levels of suction allow both my son's rough facial features and my daughter's sensitive skin to be cleaned comfortably. We are very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Juice Bar

customer_reviews.title: As a man I endorse this product
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of blackheads. I have oily skin which requires me to pay more attention to it to keep from breaking out. I've been using all kinds of products but one of my friends suggested I get one of these and just use it a couple times a week. I had my first session yesterday and my face feels great. It's just enough suction power so that it pulls the dirt out without feeling like it's sucking out my soul. It also doesn't leave my face red and irritated which is another issue I have with other facial cleaners. Overall I would recommend this product. I will update my review if anything changes. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hanz

customer_reviews.title: NOT A GOOD BUY.
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible for sensitive skin. I followed the instructions steamed my face, used this just now on the LOWEST SETTING , it hurt, made my face inflamed, and I am certainly going to have bruises. It does get out the gunk pretty well, BUT I think I’d rather traditionally take care of my blackheads than use this to damage my skin so harshly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Really Work
customer_reviews.text: I was so optimistic about this product. I read the good reviews and the bad ones and figured I'd gamble on it. Used as the manufacture specified, had showered first, used the smallest suction fixture with the highest suction setting. It was able to get some dead skin off, but it never got anything out of my pores or made them look smaller. Tried it several times on different types of acme and no avail. Luckily it didn't bother my skin at all or give me red marks like some others. Waste of money...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skip the Spa treatment!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked by the amount of suction this Pore Vacuum had. I was pleased to see the number of blackheads and dirt from my pores that went into the caps. I had no idea my face was that dirty! I noticed after the first use how much smaller my pores were and blockage that is removed. After using the vacuum and cleaning and moisturizing my face, I noticed a difference immediately. I would recommend this to whoever needs a proper deep blackhead removal and pore shrinkage. offer mild suction to help remove blackheads from the skin
customer_reviews.author: C Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum has 5 different strength settings and 4 different head attachments to target specific areas. The instructions are really detailed so you can feel comfortable knowing that you are doing things correctly.. it is your face after all! I have sensitive skin so I stayed on the lowest setting and it still did the job! My pores are definitely open now and I can see where the hard to reach dirt/blackheads have been removed. The whole process was pretty quick and easy to do and I can see a noticeable difference already.
customer_reviews.author: N. Santo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tool and cute green color
customer_reviews.text: I actually love the color green, this is so beautiful, I have to preserve my face because my face is my youth, after 30s my face is very oily and have a lot of blackheads. This product does not cause pain like the other machines do. With this I controlled the level according to my thin skin. I use hot water because that seems to work better. I usually use skII serum after follow by lotion.i have to clean this very often because it collects a lot of blackheads and skin. This work very efficient to my liking without much pain!
customer_reviews.author: karminmou

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it already! Haha
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I definitely recommend using it after your shower, or just make sure your pores are open. I’ve only used the suction on the 2nd level because it IS powerful. When I first used it I left it on for to long (I wanted to see stuff coming out) So it did leave bruises. Make sure you move it as fast as you can(literally) to avoid this. The bruise did go away after about 24hours. Be sure to close your pores after using this. To avoid putting dirt back into your pores. I’ve only used it on my problem areas where I have blackheads. (Nose creases,crease in my chin,forehead)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Metz

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little tool
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly does this thing have some section! Really pulls all the gunk out of your pores! The very first time I tried it, I had it on the lowest setting and only used it for about 5 seconds, and it already pulled out quite a bit of debris. I will state that even the lowest suction setting is very strong. Best suited for those with normal skin sensitive and who need a good, deep cleaning. I Also really enjoyed the exfoliating head. I feel like it was icing on the cake for clean, smooth skin.
customer_reviews.author: DRV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was awesome and painless!!! My nose and under my lip always have the worst whiteheads - and this tool cleaned them out quick! My skin is super sensitive, and there was no reaction from the suction or cleaning heads. The heated end is really nice for opening up pores without having to use a hot towel. Even tried it son’s facial hair where he shaves, and it got rid of the bumps from shaving irritation that easily become hair bumps!!! Have to order a second one for him to use! This is a must have for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got one before this which was cheaply made and I had to return it. This one made of better material, the weight feels good in hand, and because of the curved design you don’t need to twist the arm in a wired way and you can see what you are doing on your face with it in a mirror. The only complaint is that the display could have been bigger a bit hard to read it, but it’s not a TV after all, so not material to the performance. Also I’ve noticed it works much better after a hot shower, when the pores open up.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Sush

customer_reviews.title: Wife approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as I saw her struggle with the blackheads on her nose. It's her first time trying these kind of products so we literally have no expectation. I made sure she understand and follow instructions of the products. She claims that it works well. She usually use it eveyr 2-3 days after washing her face. She said it does help remove the blackheads and her skin feels much cleaner and smoother. She did say a little more power on the suction would be great but overall she's happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction power!
customer_reviews.text: Strong suction power, for sure! When I first turned it on, and felt the suction with my finger (on the lowest setting) I didn’t think it was strong. UNTIL I put it to my face and boy, it really does grab ahold of your skin! I didn’t see a huge difference and it did leave my face a little red but I did get see some gunk in the tube after using. Just be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: The effect is very good
customer_reviews.text: I have grown a lot of blackheads recently, and I need a cleanup. This is an anti-blackhead acne, it has stronger suction power and higher cleanliness on the skin. Good results for stubborn blackheads, whiteheads, dead skin, oils and makeup residues. It has multiple tips corresponding to different skins, and there are multiple modes to adjust. The built-in battery is fully charged and can be used for two hours. It is convenient to carry. It is very convenient for me who travel frequently. After these few days of use, the effect is also very good, I hope the final effect can be satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Karen DeMauro

customer_reviews.title: It came charged!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I received this product in the mail. I was prepared to charge it of course. It came in fully charged. The product works great and immediately cleaned my nose pores out. We cleaned it and each roommate gave it a try with the same experience! This is the new way to keep our faces extra clean with out marks and scares!
customer_reviews.author: Macy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for cleaning very superficial dirt, oil, and blackheads, but the deep ones will have to be squeezed out manually as this little guy can't bring them out. You can leave the vaccuum on for a long time, but you'll only get a hickey on your face for your troubles. Expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Bruised my face up BAD
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful little tool for sure...i have sensitive skin and was sincerely hoping it would help around my cheek/nose area specifically....within minutes I have several large and obvious bruises after little use with it - would not recommend for sensitive skin by any means. I have close to golf ball sized marks.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible !!!! Will leave a hockey looking bruise on your face do not purchase !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is ideal for deep cleaning and facial maintenance. Suction is powerful so make sure you use the lowest settings for sensitive skin. Its important to mention that you should not suction an area for more than a few seconds, it will create a bruise or red blotches. A tip: prepare face beforehand by opening pores with steam. This is ideal for deep cleaning and avoiding irritation to the skin. I also used my Bestope metal utensil for those tough-to-get blackheads. Overall it is a really good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marieliz Cartagena

customer_reviews.title: So bummed!
customer_reviews.text: So I actually liked this product. It worked good. while it worked! As soon as it died and I recharged it, it stopped working. It powers on but won’t work. I’ve tried to find the customer service number because I would like a replacement. To no prevail though. I only used it for a little over a month. I won’t use this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! It's very powerful so I personally don't even need it full blast. It works as a fantastic exfoliator. It works better with a liquid on your face so it glides smoothly, especially if you are exfoliating. All in all it works great and has great suction. Pulled a bunch of nasties off my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Dubois

customer_reviews.title: This thing really sucks! ...... but in a good way =)
customer_reviews.text: Great face/pore cleaner. Need 2 of them. My girlfriend cant keep her hands off it long enough to charge back up! I do like the fact that you can. Charge it. But i dont like that the batteries dont last so long. Id of corse rather have one more smaller nosle/head that shrinks the size for t hff e scuction tip but the 4 it cones with is still nice. And dont loose the inner ring when you clean it. It didnt come with an extra 'inny' casket. But still for the price its hot my 5 star vote.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: This is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this blackhead remover. Great packing, nothing broken. Very strong suction (but adjustable), great instruction book which covered all the questions- where to begin on face and which direction to pull towards. It will leave some redness and tingling to skin which is understandable because of blood circulation but they also inform you that it will go away from half an hour to 24 hours. Depending on your skin. Overall I love this new facial gadget. Although it did not remove the deeper blackheads on the first time it did however, bring them to the surface. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I came across this product, very skeptical, but after reading the description and several positive reviews, we just had to give it a try... and WOW!!! It really does work. My wife uses it every day and it really is amazing how clean it makes your skin look in such a short amount of time. In only a few days, her parents seeing her on FaceTime even complimented how good she looked, not even knowing she was using a new product, and had to get one for themselves. It may seem a little weird at first, but trust me... it is totally worth it. Would recommend this product to absolutely everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Hankhemoth

customer_reviews.title: My face feels so clean!
customer_reviews.text: This pore cleaner is nicer than I expected for the price. Its very sturdy and feels quality. It comes with several different heads and a nice box to keep it in. Its simple to use. I wasn't sure what to expect the suction to feel like, but it didnt hurt at all or irritate my fave. I sometimes get blackheads on my nose or chin after wearing heavier makeup and this really dod the trick with cleaning out my pores. Its very easy to change heads and there are multiple suction levels so you can find the right level for your personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Caution very strong suction.
customer_reviews.text: My wife ordered this blackhead remover for me, she started off with lowest level which did not do anything on stubborn blackheads after getting frustrated she switched to highest suction level which apparently was too high and left red circles but did the job. After couple of trial we found the level which is suitable for my skin. Good product and will recommend to find the suction level which suits your skin first before using it directly on face. Overall satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Kb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap head pieces
customer_reviews.text: I used it once, and the second time trying to use it, I noticed the head pieces broke. I don’t know how, but it seems like the pink plastic piece are cheap plastic. I do like it a lot, but idk if it’s worth getting another one or if I just want my money back...
customer_reviews.author: Anomaly

customer_reviews.title: Ladies and gentlemen my cotton round is clean!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing but I'm honestly glad I did, I have an extractor kit that I normally use to deep clean my pores but it's kind of a hassle to use. I have oily-combination skin so my pores are prone to get clogged so I need a deep clean at least twice a week, but with this tool, it makes the job so much easy and I think it actually does the job better than any extractor kit. Usually, when I would follow up with a toner on a cotton pad there still would be some residue/dirt left behind on the pad when I wipe, but not with this. Ladies and gentlemen my cotton round is clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Laure E

customer_reviews.title: Great suction pressure
customer_reviews.text: First time owning a device like this. Previously always done by hand. But after having this tool, makes my life so much easier. Suction is unbeleviably good. It cleaned some deep pours. Make sure to move around while suction is on otherwise will be hard to pull it off your face 😜
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: omg it works
customer_reviews.text: i thought this would be a gimmick but it can suck SO HARD (thats what he said). Im impatient so i did not read the instructions switched it on the highest setting straight out of the box and got to work. Left myself with a baby hickey on my cheek that went away after 15 minutes or so and thoroughly grossed myself out with the results of what i sucked out.. This face vacuum is LIFE. i combined with skincare from 'the ordinary' and im so so happy. Quarantine glowup coming at you.
customer_reviews.author: amsyams

customer_reviews.title: Not as satisfying as I’d hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a satisfying puss/gunk “pull” from the pores, this probably isn’t for you. My fingers and the tool to push around a blackhead works better than this product. Not saying it won’t work for anyone, this just wouldn’t be my “go-to” personally. I had higher expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, really works. I wish I had it sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this when I was in my teens. It really works well. I gave it to my son and now his acne has improved. Also my wife used it on her wrinkles and they look much better. This is a great product and not that expensive. Acne treatments cost more. It is worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I have always seen many ads on this vacuum blackhead remover on the social media before. But i didnt really believe that it works so well. I have the old tool which hurts alot and its also made of iron which i dont like. This one just cleared out my blackheads easily and confortable to use. This was my first electronic blackhead remover and i like it...
customer_reviews.author: Sugarmaa

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Pre-Bed Activity Now!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I would have never thought this thing would be worth the money. Who needs a plunger for their face?! Apparently I do. Holy moly - the way this thing pulls blackheads from your nose without any pain is INCREDIBLE! I didn't know I had that much junk in my skin, and after using this my skin has felt much better. It's convinced me to start actually washing my face with real facial cleanser, but this will still be a part of my routine!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Sjostrom

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased after reading reviews for this specific product and others that were similar. I followed the directions, attempted to use it three separate times and it didn't do anything! Very disappointed as I was excited for something like this. Don't waste your time or money. Item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This really sucks! In a good way.
customer_reviews.text: This device holds power charge for many uses. I have used it for a week on the initial charging. Suction is amazing, my pores are shrinking and super clean. Powerful suction at level 3+. Definitely need to lower power for some softer areas of my face. I think it is also reducing fine lines and making my skin look radiant from bringing blood to the surface. A word to the wise, follow directions and move at a consistently moderate speed across face to avoid getting a hickey on your forehead. I am thinking of buying these for my grown children as a surprise gift.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Frewert

customer_reviews.title: it works good!! But you should take a hot shower before using it.
customer_reviews.text: I have many black spots in the area of ​​my nose, they are very small and difficult to remove, this product has helped me remove but it has not been possible for all of them to come out, for now what I can recommend for improving the result is taking a shower with hot water and of course letting the face get a lot of steam, you need to have your pores wide open to see results, however I consider it to be a good product, not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lalitasu

customer_reviews.title: A device that does more for your pores
customer_reviews.text: I’ve done things from pinching the blackheads like it’s Saint Patrick’s day, pore strips, and an array of cleaning oils and cleansers. At first, I was in disbelief about the good things being said about this handy tool, but after a week of using it. I am with the mass. This tool is incredibly easy to use and removes my blackheads with ease. The suction is awesome, but I wouldn’t mind it being a tad bit stronger too. It is alittle tricky to clean, so I like to use a small brush to get into the bottle neck part of the suction head while running it under water. Otherwise, it’s a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible little machine! Very strong suction help with my blackheads on my nose and whiteheads on my forehead. I do really like different sizes of suction attachment. I used warm cloth on my face before I started to remove blackheads and it was painless and very effective. Skin looks clean and smooth after using it. I have to say I did try different blackheads removers before,more and less expensive but this one is the best one so far and worth every single penny!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES GARNER

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I’ve used it twice and it really cleans my pores! I have not used the highest suction setting, i really don’t think it’s necessary. Be careful not to hold it in once place for too long, especially on more sensitive areas because it can leave a mark! I had a suction mark on my chin lol. I have sensitive skin and it works very well. Leaves your skin red afterwards for a few minutes. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Powerful suction
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked that this works as well as it does! I was prepared for weak suction power but this has great suction power and is great at unclogging pores on my nose and chin. I would recommend taking a shower beforehand or using a facial steamer so you get the most gunk out of your pores. Also, it can redden or dry out your skin, especially if you have sensitive or thin skin, so I would use a soothing lotion afterwards on your face.
customer_reviews.author: cocoabutter

customer_reviews.title: Useful and effective product
customer_reviews.text: This is a useful device that I wish I had purchased sooner. I had a barber use it on me one time last year part of a facial treatment. Typically I just squeeze my nose and the area around it, but it normally gets irritated after. Since using this product for a couple of weeks I am already seeing a difference. I have fairly sensitive skin that gets oily sometimes and have large pores. The 3 to 4 setting works well for me. Before and after using this vacuum I use a face wash which contains Salicylic Acid. There are now noticeably fewer blackheads and my pores appear to be shrinking. Will continue using as directed max twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Naum Kaluzhny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do such a good job
customer_reviews.text: This system doesn't do a good job with removing black heads especially if they are deep in your skin. In order for this system to suck out the blackheads they practically have to be popping out of your skin already. So if you have to pop them out then you don't need the suction.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Works, but it is STRONG
customer_reviews.text: It has definitely pulled gunk out of my face. I do have somewhat sensitive skin so it leaves it red for a while. I tend to only use this at night so my skin goes back to it's normal color by morning. You definitely do not want to leave it in the same spot for more than a couple seconds. It works best for me if I use it right after showering and slowly glide it across my skin instead of sticking it on specific spots.
customer_reviews.author: dbc

customer_reviews.title: All round good, but not better than the professionals
customer_reviews.text: This worked amazing on my skin but using it too often like once a week broke me out more. So you do have to pay attention to how your skin reacts to this. This cleaned my pores out very well! However this died on me too quickly. It lasted for 5 months. I don't see myself buying one every 5 months. It was great while it lasted but I think my skin prefers the natural way of cleaning my skin. I will let the professionals deep clean my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Holm

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised at how much suction this has!
customer_reviews.text: This product has a lot of suction, I didn’t even have it turned all the way up and it was working. I’m not sure about if it’ll actually make you look better but it does what it is supposed to do! It actually got some stuff out that was pretty gross... but I don’t really think it sucks all of the oil out of your pores. I have pretty sensitive skin and it wasn’t bothered by this thing at all. I intend to keep using it and will update on the long-term effects.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is pure crapola. Sure, it sucks. On the lowest setting it left hickies all over my skin WITHOUT sucking anything out of my pores. And yes, I read the directions and followed them (maybe get a better English translator before publishing the directions????). This machine did literally nothing for me except mark up my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Rawding

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was skeptical about using this product and a little scared but I watched a YouTube video and read some reviews and said what the heck. Upon using on the first day I got it it came with a lot of different parts which was cool the suction is good and it had instructions lol. But I have had this blackhead that I’ve been trying to squeeze out since Monday. I used the vacuum and it sucked that bad boy out and it dint even hurt. Now my skin did turn red but I’m not sure if it’s because I’m super light. All in all it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Edward thomas

customer_reviews.title: It sucks!! No really, it does!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a little over 2 weeks and it works great! I have a very oily nose with a lot of blackheads and this literally sucks it right out. For me, no bruising is left, just redness for a little while after. I do this about every 3-4 days. I have psoriasis and this just does fine with it. SORRY ANOUT THE GROSS PICTURE! But I wanted to show how good this works. I’ve been using this for 3 weeks now and every time I use it, I get more gunk out.
customer_reviews.author: Lero

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool works beyond belief
customer_reviews.text: I thought for the price that this cleaner was going to be bad, but then I turned it on and it had an unsurprising amount of suction. I’ve cleaned the blackheads out of my nose. The diamond lattice head does really good for exfoliation and the oval tip does a really good job at removing the wrinkles. It’s not so powerful that it leaves red marks, but you can feel it pulling the crud out. 10/10 I highly recommend this to anyone wanting to work magic to their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Teale

customer_reviews.title: Take baby steps. New part of your routine.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this thing. I would definitely recommend working your way up on the strength. Think of it like mowing your lawn. You don’t want to go too fast, and you NEVER stop in one place. If you do, your going to get a purple spot. You can always go back over a spot to touch it up. This is no miracle worker. It will get a lot of gunk out of your face, but don’t expect to have perfect skin. This is just a new part of your routine and ongoing battle.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I did research for A few months and I’m so glad I finally got it. I’ve been using for a month now, 2-3 times/week. I have extremely sensitive Olive complected skin, with a few sun spots and hormonal acne. After using this product my skin products and makeup absorb/go on better. In the last week I’ve been getting more unsolicited compliments on skin! Highly recommend! It’s easy to charge. Easy to clean and alternate between fittings.
customer_reviews.author: ANJ

customer_reviews.title: This one finally works
customer_reviews.text: I have a very oily skin and hence it has lots of black and white heads. I tried this remover two ways, I washed my face and used it and the result was great, all my white heads were gone and there was a lot of oil on the suction tip. Well, next I took some steam on face and then used this, the results were even better. The suction is superb I never needed to go to a higher setting because speed 1 and 2 worked great for me. I will be using this a lot it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Aastha

customer_reviews.title: Works great, worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have high hopes because of the last pore vacuum I purchased a few years ago was garbage, but this one is AMAZING. I have had such a bad problem with the pores on my nose being clogged and NOTHING was helping, until this gem. Every time I have used this just on my nose alone I am blown away by how much and how well it works. The pores on my nose are already looking way better and I’ve only used this about 5 times so far. I am really glad I decided to try this. Well worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Tnmom2017

customer_reviews.title: But this
customer_reviews.text: We checked the reviews and we were amazed so I purchased it. Now my wife can’t put it down and it works great . She used to have pimples and blackheads .but now it works so good she sucked them all and now has baby face skin. She goes around the house looking for someone to try it on. I gave in and let her attack my face and she was right I don’t have one blackhead .. but this product
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for something like this for a long time
customer_reviews.text: For many years now, I have always had rough skin because of all the blackheads on my face. In order to get rid of them, from time to time I will have to manually squeeze them out using my fingers. However, ever since I got this blackhead remover, I no longer needed to do so manually. This vacuum clears my skins almost immediately and helps me remove blackheads in spots that I normally had a lot of trouble doing so. I almost use this everyday and definitely recommend to anyone that also have trouble getting rid of their blackheads on their face.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas18wong

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and sucks all the junk out!
customer_reviews.text: BEST Face cleaning vacuum I've ever used! I have used a few other pore vacuums, and this one beats them all! It charges in about five hours, and has an adjustable suction power so you can make sure you're not using too much pressure. My face did get a little red after, but no pain at all! It was very easy to clean the vacuum head, and I just let it air dry. I would suggest this product to anyone looking for a pore vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Great tool and works great for me
customer_reviews.text: This blackhead vacuum definitely worked for me as you can see in the pics . I could see my white/ black heads coming out as soon as I placed the suction against my skin. I used the strongest setting but if you have a sensitive skin , you might try the lower setting. It’s best to use right after you take a shower or wash your face. I also tried it on my husband skin and worked on him as well. Great tool for the money and works great 👍.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Cleans DEEPLY!
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers, I had no idea there were so many blackheads in my nose! Pretty gross, honestly but so glad I got this thing! The swelling/redness only lasts about 30 mins for me. It also helps decrease puffiness as it increases blood circulation. You cannot wet the machine so you do have to be very careful about cleaning it. I would definitely start with lower suction the first and second time, and then increase it as you feel more comfortable with how to use/maneuver it.
customer_reviews.author: Romey Youniss

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Very happy with this one compared to others that I have used before in the past. The battery life is incredible. The suction is good. I did learn the hard way however to not let it sit in one place for more than about a second especially on sensitive areas of skin like the neck. I have sensitive skin to begin with and I ended up with bruising that almost looked like a small hickey lol. I turned the suction down a notch and don't hold it in one place for very long more of a moving motion and haven't had that problem a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Long

customer_reviews.title: Great for blackheads!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter and she LOVES it. She is a teenager with the typical oily t-zone, so she occasionally struggles with blackheads. We have tried several different creams and ointments, but none work perfectly well. When she got this, she absolutely loved it! It doesn't leave any bruising, like some we have read about. in other reviews. So, she is very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sape

customer_reviews.title: Pore-fect for getting the gunk out my pores!
customer_reviews.text: This pore device actually works well and gets used often in my household. It's amazing much gunk our faces collect and produces. It's kinda intriguing watching it work. Both the packaging and product are of good quality. I like the sturdy box and actually keeo the device inside the original box when not in use. Using this device is a breeze. I do have sensitive skin so I'm careful not to overuse the device.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned out my pores and removed blackheads
customer_reviews.text: I have a oily skin and I love this small gadget/tool. It has four different suction mounts for: 1. Blackhead removal 2. Skin tightening 3. Exfoliating 4. Removing dirt/grease; cleaning It has inbuilt battery that charges with Micro C USB charger (cable included) It is lightweight and you can set the intensity of the suction.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Udain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blackhead remover & no more pain due to strips!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! The five different suction setting serves the purpose of all skin types, know your skin & use it accordingly. I've oily skin & it worked best for me; blackheads are out, skin looks clean & all this done painlessly unlike the strips I previously used. For the best result, use on wet skin. Surprisingly, the best tool to remove blackheads then strips. Don't keep it at one spot, use in upward-downward fashion/or use your best judgment to avoid any redness. Nice product & best rate, recommended to friends & family, they are happy.
customer_reviews.author: shaishav

product_meta.title: Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum - Electric Blackhead Vacuum Cleaner Blackhead Extractor Tool Device Comedo Removal Suction Beauty Device for Women
product_meta.description: Color:BlueBlackhead Remover Pore Vacuum - Electric Blackhead Vacuum Cleaner Blackhead Extractor
feature_bullets: Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum. Our pore vacuum has more powerful suction and deeper cleansing of your skin. After tests implemented by more than 1000 users, this blackhead vacuum can effectively remove stubborn blackheads, whiteheads, dead skin, grease and makeup residues, smooth wrinkles and tighten skin after continuously using it for 2 - 5 weeks.

Electric Blackhead Vacuum Cleaner. The pore vacuum is designed for a variety of skin types. Use vacuum absorption technique from level 1 to level 3 suction forces, level 1 is for sensitive and dry skin, level 2-3 are for neutral skin, level 4-5 are for mixed and oily skin. Meanwhile, it has 4 suction heads for different skin conditions: Cleans up blackhead, removes dirt grease, reduces dead skin and fine lines, massage and tighten the skin.

Electric Blackhead Remover Vacuum. USB rechargeable no more worry about replacing batteries, built-in rechargeable 1000mah lithium battery can last over 150 minutes on a single charge. LED display is used to check the suction level and battery power. It conforms to the principles of human body engineering and handhold design, easy to carry; you can enjoy your professional SPA skin care at home or traveling.

Blackhead Extractor Tool Device Comedo Removal Suction. Electric blackhead remover pore vacuum is made of reliable ABS material and uses an effective physical approach to solve the skin problems without any chemicals that are toxic and harmful. It is safer and more effective than traditional facial cleaning method. Meanwhile, high-end package is very wise choice for sending to your family and friends as a gift.
Blackhead Remover.This pore vacuum has CE, ROHS certificated to ensure you feel assured during using our pore vacuum extractor.Excellent quality Pore Vacuum.
